headline: Williams-Sonoma, Inc. declares quarterly cash dividend
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 18, 2025--Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE: WSM) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.66 per share of common stock. Each stockholder of record as of the close of business on October 17, 2025 will be paid the cash dividend on November 21, 2025.

Each stockholder of record as of the close of business on October 17, 2025 will be paid the cash dividend on November 21, 2025.
